name: Ghosthunt: Deep Forest (by Team SASAEYO)
description: In Ghosthunt: Deep Forest, you play as Scarlet, a young ghost hunter in desperate need of money. One day, a new client comes to her office, with an information about a rampage of ghosts in Vysoké Tatry. Packed with her trusty guns, it's up to her to clear out the forest from this otherworldly menace once and for all! (and get handsomely paid in the process...)
